title: There is no 'next chest available in X days' message
body: It used to say when the next chest would be available -- I have all four at the moment (no grays) but I swear I haven't had a chest for way over a week now. Am I ever going to be eligible again or what?

replies.body: If all 4 chests of yours are gold (you have no unearned chest) then there will be no countdown, the 7 day countdown will start again when you have earned at least 1 chest.

If you're meeting the requirements to earn a chest, you should. These are:

1. Not be under any loot restrictions due to behavior in League

2. Not be playing a champ that you've already earned a chest on during this season

3. You or someone in your premade earns an S in the match

4. You win the match

For complete details on this system, check out our [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). Let me know if you have any questions.

Point 4 is wrong, you don't need to win a match to get a chest, you just need an S(+/-). Granted, it can be hard to get an S and still lose the game, but it's possible.

On the other hand, wins are necessary for key fragments, but performance isn't taken into account for key fragments at all.

You're right, thanks for correcting me on that.
